title: Wearable Stress and Affect Detection Analysis Project
description: Built a classifier large-scale sensor data model to detect emotional state.

title: Templatize Data Pipeline
description: Helped engineer a template for a data pipeline using AWS technologies to bring in analytics for a variety of projects.

title: Netflix Recommendation System
description: Built a recommendation system to recommend films based off of a large dataset and viewer activity.

title: Vegetation Management Pipeline
description: Helped engineer a data pipeline using AWS technologies to bring in analytics for the Vegetation Management Project.

title: HR Job Requisition Dashboard
description: Built a Power BI dashboard to track job requisitions in the pipeline of approvals to streamline and improve progress tracking.

title: Field Service Delivery Pipeline
description: Helped engineer a data pipeline using AWS technologies to bring in analytics for the Field Service Delivery Project.

title: Wildfire Risk Analysis
description: Built a variety of machine learning models to identify assets that are higher risk of wildfire within the San Diego service territory.

title: IT Employee Dashboard Skills
description: Built a Power BI dashboard to identify skills training for over 400 IT employees.

title: IT Employee Training Automation
description: Created an automation using Power Automate to streamline employee responses to training activity during the year.

title: Viasat VPN Streaming Classifier Capstone Project
description: Built ML models to classify VPN user streaming behavior using network data such as IPs and packet sizes.

title: TRELS First Generation Barriers
description: Built a range of machine learning models to identify barriers that keep first-generation students from going to college.

title: Diversity in Data Science New Organization
description: Created a new organization for UCSD students to promote diversity in data science.
